channel.title: graphs on jmtirado.net
channel.description: Recent content in graphs on jmtirado.net

item.title: The many challenges of graph processing
item.description: In a previous post I exposed my opinion about the lack of a clear platform/solution/framework/architecture for graph processing. However, what are the main issues graph processing has to deal with? Serve these lines as an appetizer for the curious minds out there.

item.title: Graph processing: a problem with no clear victor
item.description: We all depend on the Internet to search for potential solutions to technical problems. For example, for big data problems after five minutes in Google you will find out that Spark may help you.

item.title: Covid19 spreading in a networking model (part II)
item.description: The original Jupyter notebook can be found here. Introduction # This notebook is the second part of our analysis of how air traffic may have contributed to spread the Covid19 virus.

item.title: Covid19 spreading in a networking model (part I)
item.description: This is a reproduction of a Jupyter notebook you can find here Introduction # The Covid19 has imposed a lot of pressure on epidemiologists to come up with models that can explain the impact of pandemics.
